Where Learning Begins

An inspiring and ultra-modern pre-school for toddlers providing education in a joyous, receptive, and supportive environment. We believe that the foundation years are crucial for lifelong learning.

Key Features

Bright & Attractive Classrooms

Colorful and engaging learning spaces designed to make education fun and stimulating

Play-Based Learning

Alternative ways of learning to avoid rote-learning or exhaustive homework

Social & Emotional Skills

Focus on developing social, emotional, physical, and academic skills together

Language Development

Emphasis on developing language, visual, and listening skills from an early age

Multi-Level Activities

Multi-level and multi-content experiences using various materials and equipment

Effective Communication

Goal to create productive learners and effective communicators

Daily Activities

Story Time & Rhymes Art & Craft Activities Music & Movement Sand & Water Play Building Blocks Outdoor Play Show & Tell Nature Walks

Ready to enroll your little one?

Admissions are open for the academic year 2026-27
